content: the bed cape by su melville when it starts to get chilly in the mornings and you still want to enjoy that first mug of coffee in bed dressing gowns are too bulky to wear what to do introducing - the bed cape the bed cape keeps your neck nice and snug covers your shoulders but you can still move to enjoy your coffee - so good my husband has one too knitted in chunky yarn this can be finnished in a couple of evenings making it a great quick knit you can easily customise your bed cape by adding extra length to the body making it extra snuggly yarn weight super chunky materials and equipment yarn rowan big wool 3 4 balls #063 red #069 green 255m/276yds 328m/357yds needles size 15 10mm circular needles or size experience level needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle 5 stitch markers finished measurements gauge regular length -
